import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import { useParams } from 'react-router' import axios from "axios" const InvoiceInfo = (props) => { const [data, setData] = useState([]) const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false) let { id } = useParams(); useEffect(() => { async function getInvoice() { try { const res = await axios.get("http://localhost:5000/" + id) setData([res.data]); console.log(data); setLoading(false) } catch (err) { console.log(err); } } getInvoice() }, []) const handleDelete = async (_id) => { await axios.delete(`http://localhost:5000/${props._id}`, { params: { id: _id } }) } console.log(props); return ( <> { loading ?
